sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import BrowserHeader from './BrowserHeader' import useNowPlayingMovies from '../../hooks/useNowPlayingMovies' import MainContainer from './MainContainer' import SecondaryContainer from './SecondaryContainer' import usePopularMovies from '../../hooks/usePopularMovies' import useTrendingMovies from '../../hooks/useTrendingMovies' import useUpcomingMovies from '../../hooks/useUpcomingMovies' import BrowserFooter from './BrowserFooter' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import GptPage from '../gpt/GptPage' import Shimmer from '../Shimmer' const Browser = () => { let[load,setload] = useState(true) useNowPlayingMovies() usePopularMovies() useTrendingMovies() useUpcomingMovies() let showGpt = useSelector(state=>state.gpt.gptSearch) setTimeout(() => { setload(false) }, 2000); return (
{ showGpt ? : <> }
) } export default Browser
